title: MCCP 6: Reduce Swap Fees to Bootstrap Users
body:
[MCCP 6](https://mips.mstable.org/MCCP/mccp-6.html) proposes to reduce swap fees of mAsset (mUSD and mBTC) swaps from 0.06% to 0.02%. This could potentially increase swap volume and make mStable's swap more competitive.

The Proposal suggests additionally to re-evaluated after 3-months if the mStable's swap volume increased while maintaining the same or greater levels of daily average fee revenue.

**Should we move forward and create a proposal as PDP-22?**
author: 0xE76Be9C1e10910d6Bc6b63D8031729747910c2f6
